channel.description: Recent content in Anova on easystats

item.title: The end of errors in ANOVA reporting
item.description: Psychological science is still massively using analysis of variance (ANOVA). Despite its relative simplicity, I am very often confronted to errors in its reporting, for instance in studentâ€™s theses or manuscripts, or even published papers (See the excellent statcheck to quickly check the stats of a paper). Beyond the incomplete or just wrong reporting, one can find a tremendous amount of genuine errors (that could influence the results and their interpretation).
